text:
has anyone had a similar problem? The whole right section of the design manager (code & options, in case of module) is blank
NOTE: this happens in chrome on all of my accounts, all extensions disabled, i am using Version 91.0.4472.114 (Official Build) (64-bit)
Try clearing your local storage all your session storage and everything in your browser from devtools and then refresh the page relog and see if it works
Is there a way to "reset" the cache of a rich text module?
usually renaming the containing dnd_area works
but not this time for some reason...
it's a global_partial if that matters
actually....the issue is even more confusing. When I delete that file from my /dist folder and rebuild it from /srcâ€”it rebuilds the original version that I deleted....

^ this really makes me question my understanding of how sandbox + src + dist work. I ended up deleting the content inside of the design manager for that page, publishing it empty, deleting the dist file, and then running everything again
